member.name: T:PubnubApi.CBOR
member.summary: A simple not-all-covering implementation of CBOR serialisation/deserialisation for internal Pubnub ParseToken() usage Converted to C# from https://github.com/seba-aln/CBORCodec

member.name: M:PubnubApi.CBOR.Decode(System.String)
member.summary: Decode incoming hexadecimal string of data and outputing decoded values
member.exception: Thrown when input is invalid or unsupported type

member.name: M:PubnubApi.CBOR.SanitizeInput(System.String)
member.summary: Removes spaces, converts string to upper case and throws exception if input is not a valid hexadecimal string
member.exception: Thrown when input contains invalid characters

member.name: M:PubnubApi.CBOR.SanitizeOutput(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sanitizes the output value so it contains even number of characters and returns it upper cased
member.param: Should the length of output be in powers of two (2, 4, 8, 16)

member.name: M:PubnubApi.CBOR.Encode(System.Object,System.Byte)
member.summary: Encodes value to a hexadecimal CBOR string. Because C# does not differentiate byte strings and text strings the only way to manipulate output type of strings is to pass a string type (one of CBOR::TYPE_TEXT_STRING and CBOR::TYPE_BYTE_STRING).
member.exception: Thrown when unsupported type is passed

member.summary: Generic effect handler.

member.summary: Handler (implementation) for a given invocation. The invocation represents the input arguments of a handler.

member.summary: Implement a handler a cancellable invocation.

member.name: T:PubnubApi.EventEngine.Core.EffectDoubleHandler`2
member.summary: Implement a handler for two invocations (meant for connect-reconnect pairs). Use EffectDoubleCancellableHandler to implement cancellable handler.

member.summary: Implement a handler for two invocations (meant for connect-reconnect pairs) with a cancel invocation

member.summary: Implement a handler for two invocations (meant for connect-reconnect pairs) with a cancel invocation

member.name: T:PubnubApi.EventEngine.Core.IEffectInvocation
member.summary: An effect invocation. It represents calling Run() on a registered effect handler - calling it is orchestrated by the dispatcher.

member.name: T:PubnubApi.EventEngine.Core.IEffectCancelInvocation
member.summary: A cancel effect invocation. It represents calling Cancel() on a registered effect handler - calling it is orchestrated by the dispatcher.

member.name: P:PubnubApi.PNConfiguration.LogVerbosity
member.summary: This property is obsolete. Use instead.
member.remarks: LogVerbosity is deprecated. Use LogLevel to enable logging. LogLevel provides more granular control and supports different standard logging levels. To migrate, replace LogVerbosity = X with LogLevel = (LogLevel)X.

member.name: P:PubnubApi.PNConfiguration.PubnubLog
member.summary: This property is deprecated. Use method to configure custom logger.
member.remarks: PubnubLog is deprecated. Implement IPubnubLogger and Use SetLogger method to configure custom logger for improved flexibility and control.

member.name: M:PubnubApi.Pubnub.CleanUp
member.summary: Call this function to globally clean up all background threads running in the SDK. Note that this will unsubscribe all channels.

member.name: P:PubnubApi.Security.Crypto.ICryptor.Identifier
member.summary:
Unique crypto algorithm identifier.
Identifier will be encoded into crypto data header and passed along with encrypted data.
The identifier **must** be 4 bytes long.

member.name: T:PubnubApi.MD5
member.summary: MD5 Service provider
MD5 messaging-digest algorithm is a widely used cryptographic hash function that produces 128-bit hash value.

member.name: M:PubnubApi.MD5.ROTATE_LEFT(System.UInt32,System.Byte)
member.summary: rotates x left n bits.

members.member: FF, GG, HH, and II transformations for rounds 1, 2, 3, and 4. Rotation is separate from addition to prevent re-computation.

member.name: F:PubnubApi.MD5.state
member.summary: state (ABCD)

member.name: F:PubnubApi.MD5.count
member.summary: number of bits, modulo 2^64 (LSB first)

member.name: F:PubnubApi.MD5.buffer
member.summary: input buffer

member.name: M:PubnubApi.MD5.Initialize
member.summary: MD5 initialization. Begins an MD5 operation, writing a new context.

member.name: M:PubnubApi.MD5.HashCore(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: MD5 block update operation. Continues an MD5 message-digest operation, processing another message block, and updating the context.

member.name: M:PubnubApi.MD5.HashFinal
member.summary: MD5 finalization. Ends an MD5 message-digest operation, writing the the message digest and zeroizing the context.

member.name: M:PubnubApi.MD5.Transform(System.Byte[],System.Int32)
member.summary: MD5 basic transformation. Transforms state based on 64 bytes block.

member.name: M:PubnubApi.MD5.Encode(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.UInt32[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Encodes input (uint) into output (byte). Assumes len is multiple of 4.

member.name: M:PubnubApi.MD5.Decode(System.UInt32[],System.Int32,System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Decodes input (byte) into output (uint). Assumes len is a multiple of 4.

member.summary: Computes the hash using the specified algo

members.member:
EncryptOrDecrypt
Basic function for encrypt or decrypt a string for encrypt type = true for decrypt type = false
